00125 extern time_t ServerBootTime ;
00126 
00143 int nfs4_op_setclientid_confirm(  struct nfs_argop4 * op ,    
00144                                   compound_data_t * data,
00145                                   struct nfs_resop4 * resp)
00146 {
00147   nfs_client_id_t       nfs_clientid ;
00148   clientid4             clientid = 0 ;
00149   nfs_worker_data_t   * pworker = NULL ;
00150 
00151   unsigned int          i = 0 ;
00152 
00153   pworker = (nfs_worker_data_t *)data->pclient->pworker ;
00154 
00155 
00156 #define arg_SETCLIENTID_CONFIRM4 op->nfs_argop4_u.opsetclientid_confirm
00157 #define res_SETCLIENTID_CONFIRM4 resp->nfs_resop4_u.opsetclientid_confirm
00158 
00159   resp->resop = NFS4_OP_SETCLIENTID_CONFIRM ;
00160   res_SETCLIENTID_CONFIRM4.status = NFS4_OK ;
00161   clientid =  arg_SETCLIENTID_CONFIRM4.clientid ;
00162 
00163   DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "SETCLIENTID_CONFIRM clientid = %llx", clientid ) ;
00164   DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "SETCLIENTID_CONFIRM Verifier = #%s#", arg_SETCLIENTID_CONFIRM4.setclientid_confirm ) ;
00165 
00166   
00167   /* Does this id already exists ? */
00168   if( nfs_client_id_get( clientid , &nfs_clientid ) == CLIENT_ID_SUCCESS )
00169     {
00170         /* The client id should not be confirmed */
00171         if( nfs_clientid.confirmed == CONFIRMED_CLIENT_ID )
00172           {
00173              /* Client id was already confirmed and is then in use, this is NFS4ERR_CLID_INUSE if not same client */
00174 
00175              /* Check the verifier */
00176              if( strncmp( nfs_clientid.verifier, arg_SETCLIENTID_CONFIRM4.setclientid_confirm, NFS4_VERIFIER_SIZE ) )
00177                {
00178                   /* Bad verifier */
00179                   res_SETCLIENTID_CONFIRM4.status = NFS4ERR_CLID_INUSE ;
00180                   return res_SETCLIENTID_CONFIRM4.status ;
00181                }
00182           }
00183         else
00184           {
00185             if( nfs_clientid.confirmed == REBOOTED_CLIENT_ID )
00186               {
00187                  DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "SETCLIENTID_CONFIRM clientid = %llx, client was rebooted, getting ride of old state from previous client instance", clientid ) ;
00188 
00189                  /* increment the instance number for this client */
00190                  nfs_clientid.client_inst_num += 1 ;
00191               }
00192 
00193              /* Regular situation, set the client id confirmed and returns */
00194              nfs_clientid.confirmed = CONFIRMED_CLIENT_ID ;
00195 
00196              /* Set the time for the client id */
00197              nfs_clientid.last_renew = time( NULL ) ;
00198            
00199 
00200              /* Set the new value */
00201              if( nfs_client_id_set( clientid, nfs_clientid, pworker->clientid_pool ) != CLIENT_ID_SUCCESS )
00202                {
00203                    res_SETCLIENTID_CONFIRM4.status = NFS4ERR_SERVERFAULT ;
00204                    return res_SETCLIENTID_CONFIRM4.status  ;
00205                }
00206           }
00207     }
00208   else
00209     {
00210        /* The client id does not exist: stale client id */
00211        res_SETCLIENTID_CONFIRM4.status = NFS4ERR_STALE_CLIENTID ;
00212        return res_SETCLIENTID_CONFIRM4.status ;
00213     }
00214 
00215   /* Successful exit */
00216   res_SETCLIENTID_CONFIRM4.status = NFS4_OK ;
00217   return res_SETCLIENTID_CONFIRM4.status ;
00218 } /* nfs4_op_setclientid_confirm */
00219

00232 void nfs4_op_setclientid_confirm_Free( SETCLIENTID_CONFIRM4res * resp )
00233 {
00234   /* To be completed */
00235   return ;
00236 } /* nfs4_op_setclientid_confirm_Free */
